name: Gondoria
description:
You are only a beggar, not a fighter or a great hero. But one day you find a map of a dungeon on the street. In each level is hidden an ancient book, five level has the dungeon. And each book is worth 1000 goldcoins!

But in the dungeon are evil men, don't touch them. Some doors need green or red keys.

I have not a scroller made, instead of it a screen-switcher. So it is not so easy to find the books in the dungeon!

(bugfixed on 08.06.22)

(bugfixed on 09.06.22)
